flixel.tweens.misc.MultiVarTween

type
class
extends
flixel.tweens.FlxTween
Tweens multiple numeric public properties of an Object simultaneously.

Constructor

new(?complete : flixel.tweens.CompleteCallback, ?type : Int)
parameters
complete Optional completion callback.
type Tween type.
Constructor.

active : Bool

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween

complete : CompleteCallback

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween

executions(default,null) : Int

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween
How many times this tween has been executed / has finished so far - useful to stop the LOOPING and PINGPONG types after a certain amount of time

finished(default,null) : Bool

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween

userData : Dynamic

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween
Useful to store values you want to access within your callback function.

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

cancel() : Void

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween
Immediately stops the Tween and removes it from its Tweener without calling the complete callback.

destroy() : Void

overrides flixel.tweens.FlxTween

start() : Dynamic

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween
Starts the Tween, or restarts it if it's currently running.

tween(object : Dynamic, properties : Dynamic, duration : Float, ?ease : flixel.tweens.EaseFunction) : MultiVarTween

parameters
object The object containing the properties.
properties An object containing key/value pairs of properties and target values.
duration Duration of the tween.
ease Optional easer function.
Tweens multiple numeric public properties.

update() : Void

overrides flixel.tweens.FlxTween
Updates the Tween.
